ggpsychro 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Custom theme for psychrometric chart.

Source: R/theme.R
theme_psychro.Rd

Custom theme for psychrometric chart.

theme_psychro(
  background = "white",
  base_size = 11,
  base_family = "",
  base_line_size = base_size/22,
  base_rect_size = base_size/22
)

Arguments

asp

Aspect ratio of plot. Defaults to NULL.

Value

A ggplot2 theme.

Examples

theme_psychro()
#> List of 93
#>  $ line                      :List of 6
